languages.text: "Футфол изможден и изранен жестокостью Чорда. Я велю основать приюты, где обездоленные и страждущие смогут обрести кров, пищу и медицинскую помощь".

traits.locale_text: "Футфол изможден и изранен жестокостью Чорда. Я велю основать приюты, где обездоленные и страждущие смогут обрести кров, пищу и медицинскую помощь".

languages.text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."
languages.original_text: "Футфол изможден и изранен жестокостью Чорда. Я велю основать приюты, где обездоленные и страждущие смогут обрести кров, пищу и медицинскую помощь".

traits.locale_text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I am going to have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."
"Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I am going to have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

"Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

languages.text: “库尔达的暴行已经让落脚港困顿不堪，伤痕累累。我打算设立庇护所，让那些身处痛苦、需要帮助的人能够找到栖身之所，得到食物与医疗救助。”
languages.original_text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

traits.locale_text: “库尔达的暴行已经让落脚港困顿不堪，伤痕累累。我打算设立庇护所，让那些身处痛苦、需要帮助的人能够找到栖身之所，得到食物与医疗救助。”

languages.text: 「チョーダの残虐性の被害にあったフットフォールは疲労し、傷ついている。だからこそ、困っている人々、そして苦痛を強いられている人々が寝泊りをし、食べ物を貰い、治療を受けられる避難所を設置しよう」
languages.original_text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダの残虐性の被害にあったフットフォールは疲労し、傷ついている。だからこそ、困っている人々、そして苦痛を強いられている人々が寝泊りをし、食べ物を貰い、治療を受けられる避難所を設置しよう」

languages.text: «Paso está exhausto y herido por la crueldad de Chorda. Voy a hacer que se levanten refugios donde los necesitados puedan encontrar techo, sustento y ayuda médica».
languages.original_text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

traits.locale_text: «Paso está exhausto y herido por la crueldad de Chorda. Voy a hacer que se levanten refugios donde los necesitados puedan encontrar techo, sustento y ayuda médica».

languages.text: "Footfall ist nach Chordas Grausamkeit erschöpft und verwundet. Ich lasse Unterkünfte für alle errichten, die bedürftig sind oder Schmerzen haben. Sie finden dort ein Dach über dem Kopf, Nahrung und medizinische Hilfe."
languages.original_text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

traits.locale_text: "Footfall ist nach Chordas Grausamkeit erschöpft und verwundet. Ich lasse Unterkünfte für alle errichten, die bedürftig sind oder Schmerzen haben. Sie finden dort ein Dach über dem Kopf, Nahrung und medizinische Hilfe."

languages.text: « La cruauté de Chorda a laissé Castel exsangue. Je vais mettre en place des abris pour offrir un toit, de la nourriture et des soins à ceux qui en ont besoin. »
languages.original_text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

traits.locale_text: « La cruauté de Chorda a laissé Castel exsangue. Je compte mettre en place des abris pour offrir un toit, de la nourriture et des soins à ceux qui en ont besoin. »

languages.text: "Binliman, Chorda'nın zalimliği nedeniyle yaralı ve bitkin hâlde. İhtiyaç sahiplerinin ve acı içindekilerin başlarını sokabilecekleri, gıda ve tıbbi destek alabilecekleri sığınaklar kurduracağım."
languages.original_text: "Footfall is exhausted and wounded by Chorda's cruelty. I will have shelters set up where those in need and in pain can find a roof over their heads, sustenance, and medical aid."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman, Chorda'nın zalimliği nedeniyle yaralı ve bitkin hâlde. İhtiyaç sahiplerinin ve acı içindekilerin başlarını sokabilecekleri, gıda ve tıbbi destek alabilecekleri sığınaklar kurduracağım."
